Bullet sat silently listening to his sentence. 2 weeks detention wouldn't b=
e to bad but having to babysit the lizzard kind of urked him. He accepted w=
hat Perceptor said with full responsabiliy but he didn't have to like it. "=
Will I be watching Chameleon in combat or at all times? He asked hopeing th=
at he could somehow turn this to his advantage. If he was to watch the hack=
er dureing battle then they couldn't enforce detention.

Blaze followed Cha=
meleon and Black Nightmare into Perceptors office just in time to hear Bull=
ets punishment. She questioned it but fealt it wiser to keep her mouth shut=
. Questioning command was against her better judgement, especially when the=
re were two members there to question. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  F=
rom: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, Ap=
ril 03, 2001 11:22 PM
  Subject: Chameleon/Bullet's punishment...


  Chama=
leon/Perceptor/Blacknightmare/Deepfear/Charon/Undergroun/Sharpclaws:

  "Ch=
amaleon, come in" said a voice that came from Perceptor's Office. The male =
came in, Perceptor felt that Blacknightmarewas araound and said that she an=
d Blaze could came in. Chamaleon's scales became gray when he saw Bullet an=
d Perceptor had to command him to sat down, the lizard-bot was shaking like=
 a leaf...

  "Well Bullet here's your punishment" said Perceptor "Our comm=
ander is very upset that most of our bots kick, stabbe, etc. Chamelon, so y=
our punishment will be this: you will have two days of retention in base...=
 plus in order to compensate Chameleon, 
  you will care that NO ONE HURT H=
IM... for every scratch that Chameleon has, YOU will be punished, if you do=
 it or not... anyone have something to say?"

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor=
